org.assertj.core.api

Class BooleanAssert

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.assertj.core.api.AbstractAssert<SELF,Boolean>
      • org.assertj.core.api.AbstractBooleanAssert<BooleanAssert>
        • org.assertj.core.api.BooleanAssert
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Assert<BooleanAssert,Boolean>, Descriptable<BooleanAssert>, ExtensionPoints<BooleanAssert,Boolean>

    public class BooleanAssert
extends AbstractBooleanAssert<BooleanAssert>
    Assertion methods for Booleans.

    To create an instance of this class, invoke Assertions.assertThat(Boolean) or Assertions.assertThat(boolean).

    Author:
    Alex Ruiz, Yvonne Wang, David DIDIER, Ansgar Konermann, Mikhail Mazursky
